sourcing.instructions: - Lanthanum Sulfide: Available from chemical suppliers or specialized online retailers.
steps: - Lanthanum Sulfide: Available from chemical suppliers or specialized online retailers.
1. Measure 80 grams of Lanthanum Sulfide and 40 grams of Praseodymium Sulfide accurately.
preparation.raw_text: 1. Measure 80 grams of Lanthanum Sulfide and 40 grams of Praseodymium Sulfide accurately.

steps: 1. Transfer the blended mixture into a ceramic crucible.
heating.raw_text: 1. Transfer the blended mixture into a ceramic crucible.

steps: 1. After heating, turn off the furnace and allow it to cool down naturally to room temperature.
cooling.raw_text: 1. After heating, turn off the furnace and allow it to cool down naturally to room temperature.

steps: 1. Once cooled, remove the solidified material from the crucible.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Once cooled, remove the solidified material from the crucible.
